Purpose: To quantitatively measure porphyrins in a 24-hour urine specimen for the detection and monitoring of porphyrias and related disorders.
Container: Light-protected 24-hour urine collection container with 5 g sodium carbonate preservative
Equipment: Centrifuge; pH test strips; light-protected tubes; porphyrin assay kit; fluorometer or spectrophotometer; pipettes and tips; vortex mixer; timer
